node.text: You know how to challenge the team. You have a clear opinion on quality and productivity. And in this way you help bring the team to a higher level.
node.name: Scrum Master

node.text: Robin is able to take responsibility for a solution. He likes to take the lead in creating a collaborative solution and then also delivers it.
node.name: Product Owner

node.text: It is great to work with you. Learned so much.
node.name: Developer
